summary: This bill, the Fortifying Refrigeration Infrastructure and Developing Global Exports Act of 2025 (FRIDGE Act of 2025), aims to improve infrastructure in foreign markets to boost U.S. agricultural exports. It focuses on providing technical assistance, including needs assessments and training, to enhance cold chain capacity, port improvements, and other infrastructure, preventing damage and loss of agricultural commodities.  It amends the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 and authorizes $1,000,000 annually from 2026-2030 for this purpose.
